course_title: Topics: Academic Korean: Current Issues through Films
class_notes: This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: A strong emphasis of this course will be placed on the ability to produce and understand communications that are stylistically appropriate for Korean academic context
